word: HE HAS A VERY FINE ORGANIZATION. HIS BONE AND BRAIN, MUSCLE AND SINEW AND BLOOD ARE ALL OF FINE QUALITY. IF HE CAN BE REARED TO MANHOOD, HE WILL TAKE RANK AS A LOVER OF WHATEVER IS GOOD AND TRUE IN ANY COMMUNITY WHERE HE MAY BE. HE NATURALLY TAKES TO THE RIGHT AND TRUE. OF HIS OWN ACCORD HE WOULD SUSTAIN LOVING RELATIONS TO THOSE OF HIS OWN AGE OR MORE ADVANCED IN YEARS.
